text: Olese ka ovel ine po šukar ki men te ovel lese phandlo baro bar17,2 baro bar Ko original terđola: “bar e mlinesoro”. hem te ovel frdime ano more, nego te ćerel jekh akale tikorendar17,2 jekh akale tikorendar Akate mislini pe upro manuša kola korkore pumen našti braninen, sar o čhavore. te perel ano greh.
